Sentencas: Developing alternative, industrially viable ethylene production routes has received important research attention.
Titulo: Electro-Oxidative Dehydrogenation of Ethane to Ethylene Using Lanthanum-Strontium-Iron Oxide Perovskite Electrocatalysts

Sentencas: One chemical pathway of interest is the oxidative dehydrogenation (ODH) of ethane, although issues such as product selectivity, combustion hazards, and oxidizer supply have hindered the practical scale-up of this technology.
Titulo: Electro-Oxidative Dehydrogenation of Ethane to Ethylene Using Lanthanum-Strontium-Iron Oxide Perovskite Electrocatalysts

Sentencas: The presented work describes the use of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) platform employing lanthanum-strontium-iron oxide perovskite (La1-xSrxFeO3-delta , or LSFx) electrocatalysts to perform electrochemical-ODH (e-ODH), a process design that has the potential to address the challenges of ODH implementation.
Titulo: Electro-Oxidative Dehydrogenation of Ethane to Ethylene Using Lanthanum-Strontium-Iron Oxide Perovskite Electrocatalysts

Sentencas: The effects of La and Sr stoichiometry, operating temperature, and current density are reported.
Titulo: Electro-Oxidative Dehydrogenation of Ethane to Ethylene Using Lanthanum-Strontium-Iron Oxide Perovskite Electrocatalysts

Sentencas: The highest performance was observed using a La:Sr ratio of 0.50 (LSF0.50) at 750 degrees C and a current density of 0.50
Titulo: Electro-Oxidative Dehydrogenation of Ethane to Ethylene Using Lanthanum-Strontium-Iron Oxide Perovskite Electrocatalysts

Sentencas: A center dot cm-2, achieving an ethane conversion of 18.7 +/- 0.3%, ethylene selectivity of 91.4 +/- 1.9%, and ethylene yield of 17.1 +/- 0.1%.
Titulo: Electro-Oxidative Dehydrogenation of Ethane to Ethylene Using Lanthanum-Strontium-Iron Oxide Perovskite Electrocatalysts

Sentencas: These results demonstrate several potential advantages for utilizing a SOFC platform to perform e-ODH of ethane to ethylene.
Titulo: Electro-Oxidative Dehydrogenation of Ethane to Ethylene Using Lanthanum-Strontium-Iron Oxide Perovskite Electrocatalysts
